[Home](./index.md) &gt; [react-hook-form](./react-hook-form.md)

## react-hook-form package

## Functions

|  Function | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [Form(props)](./react-hook-form.form.md) | Form component to manage submission. |
|  [set(object, path, value)](./react-hook-form.set.md) |  |
|  [useController(props)](./react-hook-form.usecontroller.md) | Custom hook to work with controlled component, this function provide you with both form and field level state. Re-render is isolated at the hook level. |
|  [useFieldArray(props)](./react-hook-form.usefieldarray.md) | A custom hook that exposes convenient methods to perform operations with a list of dynamic inputs that need to be appended, updated, removed etc. • \[Demo\](https://codesandbox.io/s/react-hook-form-usefieldarray-ssugn) • \[Video\](https://youtu.be/4MrbfGSFY2A) |
|  [useForm(props)](./react-hook-form.useform.md) | Custom hook to manage the entire form. |
|  [useFormState(props)](./react-hook-form.useformstate.md) | This custom hook allows you to subscribe to each form state, and isolate the re-render at the custom hook level. It has its scope in terms of form state subscription, so it would not affect other useFormState and useForm. Using this hook can reduce the re-render impact on large and complex form application. |
|  [useWatch(props)](./react-hook-form.usewatch.md) | Subscribe to the entire form values change and re-render at the hook level. |
|  [useWatch(props)](./react-hook-form.usewatch_1.md) | Custom hook to subscribe to field change and isolate re-rendering at the component level. |
|  [useWatch(props)](./react-hook-form.usewatch_2.md) | Custom hook to subscribe to field change and isolate re-rendering at the component level. |
|  [useWatch()](./react-hook-form.usewatch_3.md) | Custom hook to subscribe to field change and isolate re-rendering at the component level. |

## Interfaces

|  Interface | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [ResolverOptions](./react-hook-form.resolveroptions.md) |  |

## Variables

|  Variable | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [appendErrors](./react-hook-form.appenderrors.md) |  |
|  [Controller](./react-hook-form.controller.md) | Component based on <code>useController</code> hook to work with controlled component. |
|  [FormProvider](./react-hook-form.formprovider.md) | A provider component that propagates the <code>useForm</code> methods to all children components via \[React Context\](https://reactjs.org/docs/context.html) API. To be used with [useFormContext](./react-hook-form.useformcontext.md)<!-- -->. |
|  [get](./react-hook-form.get.md) |  |
|  [useFormContext](./react-hook-form.useformcontext.md) | This custom hook allows you to access the form context. useFormContext is intended to be used in deeply nested structures, where it would become inconvenient to pass the context as a prop. To be used with [FormProvider](./react-hook-form.formprovider.md)<!-- -->. |

|  [UseFieldArrayAppend](./react-hook-form.usefieldarrayappend.md) | Append field/fields to the end of your fields and focus. The input value will be registered during this action. |

|  [UseFieldArrayMove](./react-hook-form.usefieldarraymove.md) | Move field array by supplying from and to index |
|  [UseFieldArrayPrepend](./react-hook-form.usefieldarrayprepend.md) | Prepend field/fields to the start of the fields and optionally focus. The input value will be registered during this action. |

|  [UseFieldArrayRemove](./react-hook-form.usefieldarrayremove.md) | Remove field/fields at particular position. |

|  [UseFormRegisterReturn](./react-hook-form.useformregisterreturn.md) |  |
|  [UseFormReset](./react-hook-form.useformreset.md) | Reset at the entire form state. |

|  [UseFormReturn](./react-hook-form.useformreturn.md) |  |
|  [UseFormSetError](./react-hook-form.useformseterror.md) | Set an error for the field. When set an error which is not associated to a field then manual <code>clearErrors</code> invoke is required. |
|  [UseFormSetFocus](./react-hook-form.useformsetfocus.md) | Set focus on a registered field. You can start to invoke this method after all fields are mounted to the DOM. |
|  [UseFormSetValue](./react-hook-form.useformsetvalue.md) | Set a single field value, or a group of fields value. |
